00011 // mitchell.cpp*
00012 #include "sampling.h"
00013 #include "paramset.h"
00014 // Mitchell Filter Declarations
00015 class MitchellFilter : public Filter {
00016 public:
00017         // MitchellFilter Public Methods
00018         MitchellFilter(float b, float c, float xw, float yw)
00019                 : Filter(xw, yw) { B = b; C = c; }
00020         float Evaluate(float x, float y) const;
00021         float Mitchell1D(float x) const {
00022                 x = fabsf(2.f * x);
00023                 if (x > 1.f)
00024                         return ((-B - 6*C) * x*x*x + (6*B + 30*C) * x*x +
00025                                 (-12*B - 48*C) * x + (8*B + 24*C)) * (1.f/6.f);
00026                 else
00027                         return ((12 - 9*B - 6*C) * x*x*x +
00028                                 (-18 + 12*B + 6*C) * x*x +
00029                                 (6 - 2*B)) * (1.f/6.f);
00030         }
00031 private:
00032         float B, C;
00033 };
00034 // Mitchell Filter Method Definitions
00035 float MitchellFilter::Evaluate(float x, float y) const {
00036         return Mitchell1D(x * invXWidth) *
00037                 Mitchell1D(y * invYWidth);
00038 }
00039 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Filter *CreateFilter(const ParamSet &ps) {
00040         // Find common filter parameters
00041         float xw = ps.FindOneFloat("xwidth", 2.);
00042         float yw = ps.FindOneFloat("ywidth", 2.);
00043         float B = ps.FindOneFloat("B", 1.f/3.f);
00044         float C = ps.FindOneFloat("C", 1.f/3.f);
00045         return new MitchellFilter(B, C, xw, yw);
00046 }
